title: Video Editor – $40 per Cut + Bonuses
job_overview:
Example of videos we need but with our style:

Upgrade to see actual info

The Work (straight to the point)

-Actual editing: 10 min of new montage + 10 min ready-made inserts we supply
- Pay: $40 per finished episode
- Bonus: +$10 every time the video crosses 100 k views  (happens often)
- Tempo: 1–2 videos a week to start, room to scale

What we hand over
- Script, pro voice-over & on-cam host clips
- Links to extra material inside the script
- Transitions, SFX, backgrounds, templates—use what you like

What you use
- Premiere Pro or After Effects (CapCut-level apps won’t cut it)
- Portfolio that shows more than TikTok/short-form edits

Heads-up
A quick (unpaid) test cut is part of the hiring flow.
